game.name: Veil: Project Conductor
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The train derails in an abandoned tunnel.No signal, no exits — only darkness and the broken remains of the carriage.You are an undercover journalist, and you had a reason to be on this train.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The train derails in an abandoned tunnel.No signal, no exits — only darkness and the broken remains of the carriage.You are an undercover journalist, and you had a reason to be on this train.
